diff_hunk:
@@ -988,6 +988,88 @@ UniValue sendrawtransaction(const JSONRPCRequest& request)
     return hashTx.GetHex();
 }
 
+UniValue testmempoolaccept(const JSONRPCRequest& request)
+{
+    if (request.fHelp || request.params.size() < 1 || request.params.size() > 2) {
+        throw std::runtime_error(
+            // clang-format off
+            "testmempoolaccept \"hexstring\" ( allowhighfees )\n"
+            "\nReturns if raw transaction (serialized, hex-encoded) would be accepted by mempool.\n"
+            "\nAlso see sendrawtransaction call.\n"
+            "\nArguments:\n"
+            "1. \"hexstring\"    (string, required) The hex string of the raw transaction)\n"
+            "2. allowhighfees    (boolean, optional, default=false) Allow high fees\n"

body: IMO as it is this block is not needed.
Already default value. Or remove default value from declaration?
Note this is ATMPWT, not ATMP ;)

+            "}\n"

+            "\nCreate a transaction\n"
